thread.title: Moto India 3rd Anniversary sale on Feb 20 and 21: Discounts and exchange offers on smartphones
thread.title_full: Moto India 3rd Anniversary sale on Feb 20 and 21: Discounts and exchange offers on smartphones

author: Srivatsan Sridhar
title: Moto India 3rd Anniversary sale on Feb 20 and 21: Discounts and exchange offers on smartphones
text:
Youtube Moto India 3rd Anniversary sale on Feb 20 and 21: Discounts and exchange offers on smartphones 
Moto today announced Moto Days Sale on 20th and 21st Feb to celebrate 3 year anniversary of its presence in India and association with Flipkart. It is offering attractive discounts, special exchange offers and instant discounts on its entire range of smartphones, exclusively on Flipkart. It will also offer 10% instant discount for IndusInd Bank credit card users. We're sending love your way with great offers on select moto devices*. Available on @flipkart on 20th & 21st Feb. #DifferentCelebratesBetter pic.twitter.com/91cI5L2heD — Moto India (@Moto_IND) February 17, 2017 
Offers on the smartphones include, Moto Z, Moto Z Play, Moto M, Moto G Turbo Edition, Moto E Power, Moto E and Moto G (2nd Generation). 
Offers on Moto smartphones on Flipkart Moto Z – Additional Rs. 2000 off (upto Rs. 20,000 off on exchange of your old smartphone) Moto Z Play – Additional Rs. 2000 off (upto Rs. 20,000 off on exchange of your old smartphone) Moto M – Additional 1000 off (upto Rs. 15,000 off on exchange of your old smartphone)
